introduction: SYNOPSISSung-ki, an old bachelor from the countryside, moves to Seoul in search of a job and love. He rents a room and busily runs around trying to find a job with little success. He has also developed a crush on his next door neighbor, Da-hye. Da-hye, who works in a coffee shop falters between money and marriage knowing full well of Sung-ki's crush on her. One day, Sung-ki witnesses Young-tak, Da-hye's elder brother, stealing money from the coffee shop. He follows him and his friends, and discovers that they are planning a bank robbery. On his way to the police station, he is shocked to see Da-hye delivering coffee because he had thought she worked for a big corporation. He overcomes his disappointment and sets off to the coffee shop but learns that she has just been kidnapped by a gang from the red light district. Sung-ki and Young-tak band together to rescue Da-hye and defeat the gangsters. They marry and live happily back in Sung-ki's hometown.故事住在农村的老太太，梦见自己爬上了首尔。住在附近地区的大吉，有勇气，没有失去勇气。另一方面，大works在一家咖啡店工作，发现他的阴茎正在迷恋自己。有一天，一个哥哥看到这dahye youngtak是抢钱从咖啡馆，而试图阴茎惊讶地看到，跟着youngtak成立了一个计划，以拂你的朋友和银行报告报告dahye出来的咖啡交货的奇观。生殖器dahye知道行参加迷人的公司参观咖啡馆不会忘记烦恼和ppajijiman dahye不祥的预感。但dahye听到抓的消息去了红灯区，并且武装手一年最终加入生殖器是dahye新闻youngtak战胜武装的救援计划dahye阴茎达到一个美妙的婚礼下来了家。
